text: The only people who never fail are those who never try.
Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right.
I failed my way to success.
Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken winged bird that cannot fly.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
I never think of the future. It comes soon enough.
Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
Take time to deliberate; but when the time for action arrives, stop thinking and go in.
A leader is a dealer in hope.
While a good leader sustains momentum, a great leader increases it.
To do great things is difficult; but to command great things is more difficult.
I avoid looking forward or backward, and try to keep looking upward.
Every artist was first an amateur.
I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence, but it comes from within. It is there all of the time.
We can do anything we want to do if we stick to it long enough.
Our business in life is not to get ahead of others, but to get ahead of ourselves.
Insist on yourself. Never imitate.
Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakes.
The only journey is the one within.
Follow your honest convictions, and stay strong.
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts; therefore guard accordingly.
Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
Happiness depends more on the inward disposition of mind than on outward circumstances.
There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something.
Happiness is not a goal, but a by-product.
Happiness is not a state to arrive at, but a manner of traveling.
The significance of a man is not in what he attains but in what he longs to attain.
Life can be pulled by goals just as surely as it can be pushed by drives.
The virtue lies in the struggle, not in the prize.
Success is the child of audacity.
The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
The surest way not to fail is to determine to succeed.
Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.
Take risks and you'll get the payoffs. Learn from your mistakes until you succeed. It's that simple.
The best way out is always through.
You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
Don't bunt. Aim out of the ballpark.
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
Success is how high you bounce after you hit bottom.
Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
I'm not afraid of dying, I'm afraid of not trying.
If you live for weekends or vacations, your shit is broken
Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
Be nice to geeks, you'll probably end up working for one.
It's easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.
Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, the mind can achieve.
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work
When you cease to dream you cease to live.
Being realistic is the most commonly traveled road to mediocrity.
Anything the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
Whether you think you can or you can't, you're right.
Failure defeats losers, failure inspires winners.
I honestly think it is better to be a failure at something you love than to be a success at something you hate.
Leadership is doing what is right when no one is watching.
I am more afraid of an army of one hundred sheep led by a lion than an army of one hundred lions led by a sheep.
If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
I'm not a businessman. I'm a business, man.
Do not wait to strike until the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
It's easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.
Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it is worth watching.
By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
After a certain point, money is meaningless. It ceases to be the goal. The game is what counts.
Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
If you're not making mistakes, then you're not making decisions.
One can get anything if he is willing to help enough others get what they want.
If you start with nothing and end up with nothing, there's nothing lost.
Yesterday's home runs don't win today's games.
You should always stay hungry. Stay hungry, so you can eat.
Not a single person whose name is worth remembering lived a life of ease.
A bad workman blames his tools.
Defeat isn't bitter if you don't swallow it.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
A person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the man doing it.
Find a job you love and you'll never work a day in your life.
If you want to be inventive, you have to be willing to fail.
Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
We make a living by what we get. But we make a life by what we give.
Believe that you will succeed, and you will.
Victory comes only after many struggles and countless defeats.
As long as you're going to be thinking anyway, think big.
Success is how high you bounce after you hit bottom
A ship in harbor is safe, but that's not what ships are for.
The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something.
Nothing will work unless you do.
Try not to be a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
You won't get anything unless you have the vision to imagine it.
If you don't have a competitive advantage, don't compete.
You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
If everything seems under control, you're just not going fast enough.
Do or do not. There is no try.
A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
Don't be cocky. Don't be flashy. There's always someone better than you.
How you climb a mountain is more important than reaching the top.
It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
Fail often so you can succeed sooner.
When you cease to dream you cease to live.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing and falling over.
If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
Success is not what you have, but who you are.
You don't choose your passions; your passions choose you.
Every time I took these bigger risks, the opportunity for a bigger payout was always there.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Everyone is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will spend its whole life believing it is stupid.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
There is only one way to avoid criticism: Do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
Anyone can deal with victory. Only the mighty can bear defeat.
If you win, you need not have to explain... If you lose, you should not be there to explain!
I believe we all work for God, not for a boss or for the president of the company.
Don't focus on the money. Focus on the work and the money will follow.
Disconnect: Buffer overflow in net message
Treat Customers like a royalty and live in their mind.
Oh yeah!
If we can't live in peace, then let's die in peace.
You can do anything you set your mind to when you have vision, determination, and an endless supply of expendable labor.
People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
It could be that your purpose in life is to serve as a warning to others.
Work sets you free.
Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
In life you have to rely on the past, and that's called history.
Show me someone with no ego and I'll show you a big loser.
Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
What do you despise? By this are you truly known.
It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?
Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
The biggest truth I love about life is that human beings, once choose to do something, would literally turn a mountain into a snow flake to do it!
When a person does not find joy in their own life and their work, they make their boss the culprit.
You don't have the same joy in slice 4 of pizza as you have in slice 1 of pizza.
You are not bored. You simply don't know that it is a beautiful thing to get bored.
It is important not only to work hard, but also to work hard on appearing to work hard!
Success in a job is rarely about success only. It is more about how much you have made yourself deserve it.
You have more chances of cracking an interview by choosing to be authentic, instead of choosing to impress the interviewer.
Everyone does what they are told. The ones who go the extra mile, go the extra mile!
You don't need to know all the answers. To know that you don't know, is a good place to start.
Great resignation is now leading to great regret I am told.
You don't have to follow the rules if the rules make you disbelieve yourself.
Freedom is just another word for nothing left to lose.
No one is impressed by your possessions as much as you are!
You have the ability to do a comeback from absolutely anything with a positive mindset.
Why the rush to change jobs in a year or 2? Grass may look greener but it isn't!
People who want to serve others often forget to solve their own issues & help themselves first.
Don't tell your dreams how big your obstacles are. Tell your obstacles how big dreams are.
Be the mentor you always wish you had!
You don't need to hurt yourself in order to succeed, just be patient & make the choices needed.
Your family background, the school you went to, the way you were raised doesn't define your future.
It's funny how we often measure situations, people from the heart when we need our mind & from the mind when we need our heart.
If hating someone can solve the problem go ahead continue hating day in and out!
Those who give you tough feedback are more likely those who care for you than those who always say only only nice things!
We keep saying fail fast, fail better and fail more, so why not celebrate them?
You can count the number of seeds in an apple but you never know how many apples a single seed can bear.
If opportunity doesn't knock, leave the damn door open.
If you are waiting to get to the finish line to finally celebrate, be at peace, be happy, then sorry to break it to you, but there is no finish line!
The best leaders are servants to their employees.
SaaS is the stupidest idea known to mankind.

There is no easy path to greatness. Hardship and struggles will be present every step of the way. Only by treading through the thorns on the road and overcoming the pain can one reach Utopia. We shall not forget the THORN.
Sometimes, not adding value is the biggest value addition.
Choice is also when you don't make one. When was it last you did not make a choice?
To truly enjoy your work, you absolutely must enjoy your life outside of work. That is when you'll bring your most authentic self to work.
Anyone can drive results for work. But a true leader drives love for work.
